Description:
Indicates access attempt to the PRT resource which can be used to move laterally into an organization or perform credential theft

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Primary Refresh Token Access Attempt
Query: sourcetype='azure-riskdetection' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'attemptedprtaccess'
